snippet: Among the questions left unanswered when Michelle Lodzinski was charged this week with killing her 5-year-old son, Timothy Wiltsey, 23 years ago: What led the authorities to charge her with the boy’s murder after all this time?
abstract: Michelle Lodzinski is charged with killing her 5-year-old son Timothy Wiltsey in 1991, whose body was found 11 months after he went missing in Sayreville, New Jersey; some involved in investigation say questions still remain unanswered about murder, including why authorities chose to charge her after 23 years.

byline.original: By MARC SANTORA and NATE SCHWEBER

lead_paragraph: Among the questions left unanswered when Michelle Lodzinski was charged this week with killing her 5-year-old son, Timothy Wiltsey, 23 years ago: What led the authorities to charge her with the boy’s murder after all this time?

headline.seo: Timothy Wiltsey Case, Cold for Years, Resurfaces With Charges Against Mother
headline.main: Arrest in New Jersey Boy’s Death Stirs Memories, but Mysteries Remain
headline.print_headline: Arrest Stirs Memories, but Mysteries Still Remain
